page.title: 04 RESERVOIR
page.content: {COVENHAM RESERVOIR. } This Reservoir was opened in early 1972 by{Princess Alexandra}and is now used by many people for sporting pastimes.The diameter of the reservoir is about 1 kilometre across and about 20 metres deep. On one side of the reservoir is a{bird watching}hut where some people watch wildlife. You are not allowed to swim and fish in the reservoir for various reasons.There is a club at the reservoir for the water sport members. On one side there is a waterworks and some houses for the men who work there.Some people go{sailing, {water-sking & wind-surfing. }The total perimeter of the reservoir is about 4 kilometres.The large car park for the visitors and member is along Bull Bank lane. A local farmer uses the outer slopes for grazing his sheep.
